Class RequestCyberblade

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RequestCyberblade
extends RequestInput
    This class represents the request that the conroller sends at the client if the player decided to use the weapon Cyberblade

    Cysko7927

      void printActionsAndReceiveInput(Terminal terminal)
      Ask at the user which effect to use and the targets to hit The user can choice the effect in three possible mode: 1) to move onto a square and whack 2 people 2)whack somebody, move, and whack somebody else 3) or whack 2 people and then move

      • RequestCyberblade

        public RequestCyberblade(boolean[] availableMethod,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ColorId>> playersWithSquaresBasicMode,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> squaresAfterBasicEffect,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Create a message of Request of input for weapon Shotgun
        Parameters:
        availableMethod - Represent the possible mode that can be used with this weapon
        playersWithSquaresBasicMode - Targets to use the Cyberblade in all different square
        squaresAfterBasicEffect - Squares that the user can choice after that he has used the basic effect
        x - Coordinate x of the square where the player is in a first moment
        y - Coordinate y of the square where the player is in a first moment
